text: Sync AgenticConsole + Enterprise + CaseCompanion + codex-control-stack repos (git pull). Report git status for each, current Node and Python versions, and confirm AgenticConsole A2A is listening on port 9451.

Bootstrap desktop repos: clone https://github.com/brokenbartender/Enterprise to C:\Users\codym\Enterprise, https://github.com/brokenbartender/CaseCompanion to C:\Users\codym\CaseCompanion, and https://github.com/brokenbartender/codex-control-stack to C:\Users\codym\codex-control-stack. If folders exist, git pull instead. Report status for each.
